result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

10:58 AM Prosecuting attorney Jordan Lippert in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Antonio Demond Hodges in court.  Attorney Allison J Borsheim in court for Antonio Demond Hodges. waives reading of Information, stands mute, not guilty pleas entered, matter to be set for jury trial Br. 3, 30 days to file motions
Arraignment scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.

3:38 PM Prosecuting attorney Jonathan Ross appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Antonio Demond Hodges appeared in court, Attorney Allison J Borsheim appeared in court for Antonio Demond Hodges. State called Sgt. Ben Neumann from the Portage Police Dept., sworn 3:40 pm; direct exam. Cross exam by Atty Borsheim. 3:45 pm Witness excused. State request bindover. Defense objects. Court found probable cause, bound over. Arraignment scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 10:30 am. 3:40 PM

9:30 AM Prosecuting attorney Peggy Crooks Nowicki appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Antonio Demond Hodges appeared in court, Attorney Peter Middleton appeared in court for Antonio Demond Hodges, on behalf of Attorney Borsheim. Attorney Middleton requested a preliminary hearing. 9:30 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Reason for non appearance by Atty Borsheim; request if warrant issued that it be stayed. State request warrant. Court authorized warrant stayed until Friday 02/18/22 at 10:30 AM. Return date scheduled for February 18, 2022 at 10:30 am. 10:18 AM
